comparison.description: Determines how the fuel time value (in ticks) of the item stack should be compared to a specific value.
comparison.markdownDescription: Determines how the fuel time value (in ticks) of the item stack should be compared to a specific value.

compare_to.description: The value at which the fuel time value (in ticks) of the item stack will be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value at which the fuel time value (in ticks) of the item stack will be compared to.

type.description:
## Fuel

---


[Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/fuel)

Checks whether the item is considered as fuel.

Type ID: `origins:fuel`

---

### Examples

```json
"item_condition": {
    "type": "origins:fuel",
    "comparison": ">=",
    "compare_to": 10
}
```

This example will check if the item fuel time value of 10 or more.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Fuel (Item Condition Type) date: 2023-10-09

Fuel

Item Condition Type

Checks whether the item is considered as fuel.

Type ID: origins:fuel

Fields

Field Type Default Description
comparison Comparison ">" Determines how the fuel time value (in ticks) of the item stack should be compared to a specific value.
compare_to Integer 0 The value at which the fuel time value (in ticks) of the item stack will be compared to.

Examples

"item_condition": {
    "type": "origins:fuel",
    "comparison": ">=",
    "compare_to": 10
}

This example will check if the item fuel time value of 10 or more.
